# bottomAnchor

**Instance Property**

A layout anchor representing the guide’s bottom edge.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var bottomAnchor: NSLayoutYAxisAnchor { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this anchor to create constraints with the guide’s bottom edge. You can only combine this anchor with other [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLayoutYAxisAnchor] anchors. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLayoutAnchor].

## Creating constraints using layout anchors

- **heightAnchor**: A layout anchor representing the guide’s height.
- **topAnchor**: A layout anchor representing the guide’s top edge.
